page.title: 11HORNSEA BRITISH BULLDOGS.BB.
page.content:
To play you have four or more players. One or two are catchers. Catchers are the people who chase the other players, who must run from den to den. A den is an object where you are safe when touching it.
The object of the game is to run from a den without being caught.
If you are caught you are "on" with the catchers. If you argue about it you can be given "dare runs". Dare runs are a number of times when you have to run from den to den. If you are caught you are "on". If you aren't you get a chance.
You can run in a group or on your own. When the last person is caught the game is finished. Stuart Rice
